page.title: 14SURGERY
page.content: SURGERY STAUNTON ON WYE The surgery building is owned by the practice 2 doctors are based there with 3 receptionists. They do their own dispensing with drugs from B'ham 3 times a week. There are 6 surgeries a week (about 120 consultations) and no appointment system so the doctors can give as much time as each patient needs. Some dislike this but most like to know the doctor always has time to listen to them. The doctors also make about 50 home visits a week. They are introducing an age sex register with recalls for cervical smears etc. and unusually they regularly refer patients to qualified local homoe- opaths and osteopaths.
